    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Žoga pade na tla</string>
            <string language="en">A ball is dropped on a hard floor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Kugel wird auf einen harten Fußboden 
fallengelassen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une boule est lâchée sur un plancher dur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma esfera é deixada cair em um assoalho duro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una sfera è caduta su un pavimento duro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σφαίρα πέφτουν σε ένα σκληρό πάτωμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una bola se cae en un suelo duro</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Opazuj padec žoge in njen odboj.</string>
            <string language="en">Observe the ball's fall on a hard floor and her bounce.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">energija trka</string>
            <string language="en">collision energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">koeficient vračanja</string>
            <string language="en">coefficient of restitution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">energija</string>
            <string language="en">energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beobachten Sie den Fall der Kugel auf einen 
harten Fußboden und ihren Schlag.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Observez la chute de la boule sur un plancher dur
et son rebond.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Observe a queda da esfera em um assoalho duro e 
em seu salto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Osservi la caduta della sfera su un pavimento 
duro e sul suo rimbalzo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρατηρήστε την πτώση της σφαίρας σε ένα σκληρό 
πάτωμα και την αναπήδησή της.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Observe la caída de la bola en un suelo duro y 
su despedida.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammenstoßenergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Koeffizient Zurückerstattung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie de collision</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">coeficiente da restituição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συντελεστής της αποκατάστασης</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>
